job_description:
1. Assist in providing HR support to different business units that aligning HR strategies with business goals.
2. Participate in resolving employee issues and improving employee engagement.
3. Assist in onboarding process and development programs.
4. Contribute to HR projects and initiatives aimed at enhancing the employee experience and organizational culture.
5. Help to analyze HR data to support decision-making processes and provide report as needed.
6. Manage regular BAU to ensure all regular process done properly.
